import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; import { MDBNavbar, MDBNavbarBrand, MDBNavbarNav, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink, MDBNavbarToggler, MDBCollapse, MDBMask, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn, MDBView, MDBContainer, MDBAnimation } from 'mdbreact'; import "../styles/ParallaxIntro.css" import mepic from "../images /me.jpeg" import NavChuck from "./NavChuck.jsx" class ParallaxIntro extends React.Component { state = { collapsed: false }; render() { return (
{/* nav bar here */} < NavChuck />

Professional Web Developer And Entrepreneur

); } } export default ParallaxIntro;
